title: Level 1 – Don’t Measure the Logical Qubit
description: In each round, Charlie offers some Pauli measurements on Alice's code. Your job: pick a measurement that is safe – it should anticommute with at least one stabilizer generator, so that it only updates the stabilizer and not the logical information.

rounds.label: Round 1
rounds.text: Warm-up: 3-qubit chain code. Only one of these is safe.

rounds.label: Round 2
rounds.text: Same code, but now Charlie targets the middle qubit.

rounds.label: Round 3
rounds.text: A slightly more evil set of options. Think about which ones are likely logical.
